author: CmdrTaco
title: LHC Will Be Shut Down In 2011 Because of Mistake

sent.goldlabel: the LHC closing for repairs and upgrades and reactions
sent.sent: astroengine follows up to a story about the LHC shutting down that seems to have hit all the news replicators today.

sent.goldlabel: the LHC closing for repairs and upgrades and reactions
sent.sent: Its to be expected when pushing the frontiers of physics but the LHCs epic will it or wont it saga continues.

sent.goldlabel: the LHC closing for repairs and upgrades and reactions
sent.sent: Due to an unforeseen construction mistake the LHC will cease experiments for a year starting around late2011 so repairs and upgrades can be carried out.

sent.goldlabel: the LHC closing for repairs and upgrades and reactions
sent.sent: For now accelerated particles will have a maximum energy of 7TeV half the power of the LHCs design maximum which is ample for at least 18 months of experiments before shutdown.

children.author: Anonymous30

sent.goldlabel: typical shutdown and upgrade times
sent.sent: 612 months is usually for an upgrade a short one CERN is calling it an engineering shutdown.

sent.goldlabel: typical shutdown and upgrade times
sent.sent: A typical shutdown is 13 months depending on lab.

sent.goldlabel: typical shutdown and upgrade times
sent.sent: For comparison sake a typical shutdown is 6 weeks every year at FNAL thats sort of an average over many years there have been 3 month shutdowns and two years between them in cases.

sent.goldlabel: typical shutdown and upgrade times
sent.sent: At SPring8 they run a typical workday not 247 and have some down time each night and tend to have shutdowns last 4 weeks after two years.

sent.goldlabel: typical shutdown and upgrade times
sent.sent: They dont really do upgrades FNAL had one in the era of the tevatron.

sent.goldlabel: typical shutdown and upgrade times
sent.sent: An upgrade tends to have a different new run afterward and tends to be at least 18 months often 2 years or more.

sent.goldlabel: typical shutdown and upgrade times

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: Its not a big deal it always happens that shutdowns get moved around.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: As a physicist all I can say is weve been asking for this kind of press.When you hype the bejeezus out of the shiny new multibillion dollar tool its reasonable for the people who paid for it to expect results.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: It is jarring when people hear for over a decade about the great results that will come out of an experiment and then later hear that we have to spend 50 of the time doing maintenance on the equipment and the first few years just testing it.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: I know this is the way things work this is the way my much much smaller experiments work.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: This is not a complaint about the science or being careful.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: This is a complaint about politics funding structures and a lack of ability across fields to communicate effectively with the general public.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: We cant keep doing this to ourselves if we want the public to trust us.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: We have to manage the media better.To begin with the great achievement of the LHC *is* the LHC not the search for the Higgs boson.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: Its enough that this is the most complicated impressive advanced piece of technology on the planet and that it required input at the cutting edge from nearly every major field of physics.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
sent.sent: Just like the point of going to the moon was to go to the moon not to bring back moon rocks.

sent.goldlabel: inaccuracies in the journalistic coverage of the LHC and managing the media
